title: Indian Hotels Company announces first Ginger Hotel in Dibrugarh
description: The Indian Hotels Company (IHCL) announced the signing of its inaugural hotel in Dibrugarh, Assam, under the Ginger brand. Positioned as a vibrant and contemporary space, the hotel will embrace Ginger's lean luxe design and service philosophy. This venture reflects IHCL's commitment to expanding in North East India, tapping into Dibrugarh's significance as a hub for tea trading and tourism. Partnering with Vela Hotel & Resort LLP, IHCL aims to offer a seamless hospitality experience in this key location, known as the 'Tea City of India'.
